title: Sleek Urban Duplex with Private Comfort in Trendy Wola
description: Experience city living at its best in this stylish duplex boasting 5 spacious bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms. Spread across 168 sqm, the layout blends open-plan social spaces with tranquil private retreats. Highlights include central air conditioning, premium insulation, and elegant finishes. Take in peaceful courtyard views from multiple rooms and unwind in the building’s residents-only courtyard or fitness center.
neighborhood_description: Right in the heart of Wola, this vibrant district fuses industrial chic with a community-friendly spirit. Enjoy abundant green spots, friendly dog parks, supermarkets, cafes, and museums all at your doorstep. Connected living is made easy with top bike paths, city transit, and swift highway access for commuting or a getaway.
lifestyle_benefits: leisurely pet walks in nearby green parks
easy bike commutes in the city
space for remote work or hobbies
target_buyer: Ideal for young professionals or creative families who crave downtown access while cherishing green escapes and cozy evenings with their four-legged companions.
market_positioning: Perfectly attuned to eco-conscious buyers and urbanites seeking generous space, new construction standards, and a central yet serene address in Warsaw’s evolving creative and business quarter.
